code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from'../protected/AuthContext';import'./NavBar.css';import purchaseHistoryIcon from'../components/Historial.png';import purchaseCarIcon from'../components/CAR-BUY.png';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const{user,logout}=useContext(AuthContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-left",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-brand",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"| PetStore |"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"navbar-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/products",children:"Productos |"})}),user&&user.rolID===2&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admin",children:"Admin Panel |"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admin/orders",children:"Order Management "})})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-right",children:[user&&user.rolID!==2&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cart",className:"navbar-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:purchaseCarIcon,alt:"Carrito",className:"car-icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/order-history",className:"navbar-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:purchaseHistoryIcon,alt:"Historial de Compras",className:"history-icon"})})]}),user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"logout-button",onClick:logout,children:"Cerrar Sesi\xF3n"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:"navbar-subscribe",children:"INICIO DE SESI\xD3N"})]})]});};export default Navbar;
